013package org.apache.juneau.http.part;
014
015import java.util.*;
016import java.util.function.*;
017
018import org.apache.http.*;
019import org.apache.juneau.assertions.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
021
022/**
023 * A {@link NameValuePair} that consists of a single string value.
024 *
025 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
026 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauRestCommonBasics">juneau-rest-common Basics</a>
027 * </ul>
028 */
029public class BasicStringPart extends BasicPart {
030
031   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
032   // Static
033   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
034
035   /**
036    * Static creator.
037    *
038    * @param name The part name.
039    * @param value The part value.
040    * @return A new {@link BasicStringPart} object, or <jk>null</jk> if the name or value is <jk>null</jk>.
041    */
042   public static BasicStringPart of(String name, String value) {
043      if (Utils.isEmpty(name) || value == null)
044         return null;
045      return new BasicStringPart(name, value);
046   }
047
048   /**
049    * Static creator with delayed value.
050    *
051    * <p>
052    * Part value is re-evaluated on each call to {@link NameValuePair#getValue()}.
053    *
054    * @param name The part name.
055    * @param value The part value supplier.
056    * @return A new {@link BasicStringPart} object, or <jk>null</jk> if the name or supplier is <jk>null</jk>.
057    */
058   public static BasicStringPart of(String name, Supplier<String> value) {
059      if (Utils.isEmpty(name) || value == null)
060         return null;
061      return new BasicStringPart(name, value);
062   }
063
064   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
065   // Instance
066   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
067
068   private final String value;
069   private final Supplier<String> supplier;
070
071   /**
072    * Constructor.
073    *
074    * @param name The part name.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
075    * @param value The part value.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
076    */
077   public BasicStringPart(String name, String value) {
078      super(name, value);
079      this.value = value;
080      this.supplier = null;
081   }
082
083   /**
084    * Constructor.
085    *
086    * @param name The part name.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
087    * @param value The part value supplier.  Can be <jk>null</jk> or supply <jk>null</jk>.
088    */
089   public BasicStringPart(String name, Supplier<String> value) {
090      super(name, value);
091      this.value = null;
092      this.supplier = value;
093   }
094
095   /**
096    * Provides the ability to perform fluent-style assertions on this part.
097    *
098    * @return A new fluent assertion object.
099    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
100    */
101   public FluentStringAssertion<BasicStringPart> assertString() {
102      return new FluentStringAssertion<>(value(), this);
103   }
104
105   @Override /* Header */
106   public String getValue() {
107      return value();
108   }
109
110   /**
111    * Returns The part value as a {@link String} wrapped in an {@link Optional}.
112    *
113    * @return The part value as a {@link String} wrapped in an {@link Optional}.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
114    */
115   public Optional<String> asString() {
116      return Utils.opt(value());
117   }
118
119   /**
120    * Return the value if present, otherwise return <c>other</c>.
121    *
122    * <p>
123    * This is a shortened form for calling <c>asString().orElse(<jv>other</jv>)</c>.
124    *
125    * @param other The value to be returned if there is no value present, can be <jk>null</jk>.
126    * @return The value, if present, otherwise <c>other</c>.
127    */
128   public String orElse(String other) {
129      String x = value();
130      return x != null ? x : other;
131   }
132
133   private String value() {
134      if (supplier != null)
135         return supplier.get();
136      return value;
137   }
138}
